name: Forgotten Memories (itch) (Daruu)
description:
The game was initially made in the span of 72 hours for the 54th edition of the Mini Jam, with the theme 'Memories' and the limitation 'The game must start and end as a different genre'.

We plan to add music, more rooms, and more elements to the game. We do this in our spare time, so if you'd like to play the updates, be patient!
